summary: Adding to my follower team is Lyzabeth Stormwind. Another Nord follower with 2handed sword. Hope everyone will give her a go.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][color=#0000ff][color=#a64d79][size=6]
[/size][/color][/color][/size]
[size=4][color=#0000ff][color=#a64d79][size=6]

Lyzabeth Stormwind
[color=#f6b26b][size=5]Nord[/size][/color][/size][/color]
[color=#f6b26b]Class-Combat 2handedWarrior
Perks-Lightfoot,Muffled movement,Bladesman60
Voice- Female Sultry
Essential and Marriageable
Location- Temple of Kynareth in Whiterun
Body- UNP Skinny
Outfit-Tavern Wench
Weapon- Ebony Greatsword[/color]
[/color][/size][/center]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffe599][size=3]This is my next installment in the follower category.I had her in my game for a while and decided that she would be a good choice for a follower. She will need to be given some armor but she is outfitted in the Tavern Wench outfit. I know that these are pretty generic followers and if I ever learn some new techniques I will add to them. If anyone would like to give feedback on making them more enjoyable, feel free to tell me.

I have a line up of more characters to turn into followers but I would like to make them more effective and unique. In time I might have the skill set for that.

Thanks to everyone who has downloaded my followers and I hope that they are contributing to your enjoyment of the game.


[/size][/color][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=3]                                                     This mod can also be used in Skyrim Special Edition.[/size][/color][/font]
author: lewbob
